FESI.Interpreter
Class EvaluationSource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--FESI.Interpreter.EvaluationSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileEvaluationSource, FunctionEvaluationSource, JarEvaluationSource, LineEvaluationSource, StringEvaluationSource, UserEvaluationSource
public abstract class EvaluationSource
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract declaration of an evaluation source. An evaluation source is used to describe the source of a program for error messages and debugging purpose.

Field Summary
protected  java.lang.String eol
          The end of line string for this machine.
protected  EvaluationSource previousSource
          The previous source in case of multi-level evaluation.
 
Constructor Summary
EvaluationSource(EvaluationSource previousSource)
          Create a evaluation source linked to the previous source (which can be null)
 
Method Summary

          Return a description of the evaluation source.
 int getLineNumber()
          Return an evaluation source number if defined
 java.lang.String toString()
          Display the description of the evaluation source
